biotools.summary: MonteCarbo is a software to generate and dock multifunctionalized ring molecules. It is able to construct simple 5-, 6- and 7-membered ring multifunctionalized monosaccharides and nucleobases and to dock them into target glyco- and RNA DNA- active enzymes.

bioschemas.name: MonteCarbo
